data.title: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Relationship Timeline
data.meta_description: From touring together in 2013 to sparking romance rumors in 2021, here's everything you need to know about Rihanna and A$AP Rocky's relationship.
data.text:
While they’ve been friends for nearly a decade, Rihanna and A$AP Rocky began sparking relationship rumors in late 2020. Rocky pretty much declared his love for Rih in a 2021 interview with GQ, and to be honest, this is the power couple of all power couples. Then, at the beginning of 2022, the couple shared that they are expecting their first child together (!!) and later that spring, they officially welcomed their baby boy. Following Rih's iconic Super Bowl Halftime Show in 2023, she announced that they're welcoming baby no. 2.

If you’re wondering how these two met and how their friendship turned into something more, read our comprehensive timeline of Rihanna and A$AP Rocky’s relationship. Below, we unpack everything we know so far.

June 22, 2023: A$AP Rocky Called Rihanna His “Wife”

After attending the Louis Vuitton Spring 2024 Menswear Fashion Show in Paris, A$AP and Rihanna jet-setted to the French Riviera for A$AP’s Spotify Beach concert in Cannes. Rihanna made a surprise appearance at the show, where A$AP reportedly called her his “wife” (!!) in a sweet shout-out.

“I’d like to dedicate this song to my beautiful wife in the motherf–king building!,” the rapper announced to the crowd during his second set, according to Page Six. What does this mean?!

Rihanna, who is pregnant with the couple’s second baby, watched the show with friends from a balcony, dressed in a sheer bump-baring dress.

May 1, 2023: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Close Out the 2023 Met Gala Red Carpet

On the First Monday in May, Rihanna and A$AP Rocky arrived to the Metropolitan Museum of Art’s famed carpeted steps fashionably late. Although fans worried that the couple were skipping fashion’s biggest night, the couple closed out the red carpet just after 10:00pm EST, dressed in stunning interpretations of this year’s theme, “Karl Lagerfeld: A Line of Beauty.”

En route to the event, RiRi donned a fur coat from Fendi’s Fall 1997 collection. The superstar evidently changed in the car, as she then arrived on the red carpet in a gorgeous white Maison Valentino gown, complete with a floral appliqué cape, dramatic train, and bodice that showed off her growing baby bump. She accessorized with cat-eye sunglasses (yes, with fake eyelashes attached) and Bulgari diamonds. Meanwhile, Rocky paid homage to Lagerfeld’s signature look with a black tuxedo jacket, white shirt, and tie, and a tartan skirt over bedazzled jeans. Absolutely worth the wait. 😍

March 12, 2023: A$AP Rocky and Rihanna Pull Up in Style at the Oscars

Rihanna is booked 👏 and 👏 busy 👏 after her historic Super Bowl Halftime Show performance. The hitmaker performed her Black Panther: Wakanda Forever power ballad, "Lift Me Up" at the 95th Academy Awards and arrived at the coveted event solo. She wore a brown Alaïa gown with a sheer top over her pregnant belly.

During her powerful performance, Rocky cheered Rih on from the crowd. The couple then reunited backstage, where she wore a stunning mint green outfit that showed off her glowing baby bump.

February 25, 2023: Rihanna Steps Out in Melon-Colored Satin Dress With A$AP Rocky in Milan

It's round two of Rihanna's maternity style diaries, and we are 100% here for it. Rih and Rocky hit up Milan Fashion Week then headed out on the town for dinner at Langosteria Bistrot. Per images obtained by W Magazine, Rih rocked a melon-colored satin halter dress and paired it with a rusted orange bomber jacket. She accessorized with a mini white fur handbag and strappy heels while Rocky wore light-wash blue jeans, square-toed boots, and a leather jacket. If this couple's going to do anything, it's stepping out in style.

February 15, 2023: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Cover British Vogue With Their Firstborn Son

Fresh off the announcement of her second pregnancy, Rihanna hit the cover of British Vogue with A$AP Rocky and their firstborn son. In the cover story, Rih opened up about how being a parent is "legendary" and how her life has changed since welcoming her 9-month-old son into the world.

"It's everything. You really don't remember life before, that's the craziest thing ever,” she told the publication. "You literally try to remember it – and there are photos of my life before – but the feeling, the desires, the things that you enjoy, everything, you just don't identify with it because you don't even allow yourself mentally to get that far, because…Because it doesn't matter."

As far as her relationship dynamic with Rocky goes, RiRi says parenthood has brought them closer together. "We have to be on the same page, but we've always kind of had that in our relationship," the Grammy-winner said. "Everything changes when you have a baby but I wouldn't say it's done anything but made us closer."

February 12, 2023: Rihanna Announces She’s Pregnant With Her Second Child During Super Bowl Halftime Show

It’s official: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky are expecting their second child together! The Grammy Award-winning artist announced the news during her 2023 Super Bowl Halftime Show, as she performed a 12-song set that included hits from her decades-long career, including “Only Girl in the World,” “Rude Boy,” and “Diamonds.” She’s the first pregnant woman to headline the halftime stage ever.

Rihanna revealed her baby bump in a red bodysuit and latex bandeau, layered under a red jumpsuit. According to People, A$AP supported the star from the sidelines, recording her performance and singing and dancing along to the epic show. ❤️

January 18, 2023: A$AP Says Rihanna's "Back Making Music Again"

Not only is Rihanna preparing for her first public performance since the 2018 Grammy at this year's Super Bowl Halftime Show, but the Anti singer is also gearing up to release new music, too. Rihanna's boyfriend, A$AP Rocky, opened up on about his excitement over her return to music. "I'm so glad that my lady's back making music again and whatnot and getting back out there," he said. "It's just incredible."

The "D.M.B." rapper gushed about Rihanna's upcoming performance. "The Super Bowl is huge, and her being the creative she is, she going to bring it, man. I'm excited. I'm more excited than everybody else, honestly."

Along with talking about their careers, A$AP explained how "unexplainable" fatherhood is. "It's just one of those things," he began. "I'm a member of our club now, like the dad club. You see a dad, you see me... I'm a full dad now."

For A$AP, fatherhood brings unspeakable joy that inspires him. "You come home to heaven every day. I'm so thankful. God is good, man."

January 10, 2023: Rihanna and A$AP Make Attend the Golden Globe Awards

Sure, everyone is talking about the most buzzed-about films and TV shows after Tuesday night’s Golden Globe Awards — but we’re booked and busy thinking about the *incredible* Schiaparelli Couture gown that Rihanna wore to the ceremony.

The artist was nominated for Best Original Song for Black Panther: Wakanda Forever’s “Lift Me Up.” This was Rihanna’s first nom, and she made her Golden Globes debut in a black, strapless velvet dress from the fashion house that featured dramatic sleeves, bustier detailing, and a short train. She complemented the glam look with black opera gloves, a statement drop-diamond necklace, and chic stilettos.

A$AP attended the ceremony alongside his GF, dressed in a classic Bottega Veneta suit and accessorized with diamond earrings. The couple skipped the red carpet for Hollywood’s big event, opting instead to head straight into The Beverly Hilton hotel.

December 17, 2022: Rihanna Shares First Look of Her Son

On Saturday, Rihanna shared an adorable first look at her baby boy, who she welcomed with A$AP Rocky this past May. The seven-month-old was introduced to the world on TikTok, in Rihanna’s very first video on the social media platform. “Hacked,” she captioned the post. The happy baby is seen in a car seat, as Rihanna laughs and talks to him in the background.

November 11, 2022: Rihanna Reportedly Wants to Have More Children With A$AP Rocky

Rihanna seems to have caught "baby fever" and reportedly wants to have more children with A$AP Rocky with whom she already has one son.

An insider told Entertainment Tonight that the Super Bowl LVII headliner has “dreamed of being a mom,” and would “love nothing more” than to expand her family with the rapper in the coming years.

“Rihanna and A$AP are so in love and have the best time together,” the source added. “They are also a great team when it comes to being parents to their baby boy. Rihanna always dreamed of being a mom and she takes a lot of pride in it. She would love to have more children with A$AP in the future.”

August 3, 2022: A Source Reveals How Rihanna and A$AP Rocky's Perception of Fame Has Changed Since Becoming Parents

An anonymous source told Entertainment Tonight how Rihanna and A$AP Rocky's perception of fame has changed since they welcomed their baby boy in May. In an attempt to protect the baby and their privacy, the new parents haven't shared any details or posted any pics online.

"They're keeping things low-key so they can enjoy their little family," the source said. "Privacy has become increasingly important to the couple. When it was just the two of them, they'd go out all hours of the day and night and interact with fans. Now, with the baby, they're a little more protective."

Per ET, Rih is currently on maternity leave and won't be back to work for a little while — at this point, we've held on to hope for #R9 for long enough, so what's a little longer? "She's one of the hardest working people out there, and she can definitely have it all," the source told ET. "[She'll] be a hands-on mom and have an impressive career."

May 23, 2022: A Source Shares Which Parent Rihanna and A$AP Rocky's Son Looks Like

Rihanna and A$AP Rocky haven't shared any photos of their newborn son online just yet.

According to In Touch, "not many people" have met the couple's baby, but Rihanna and A$AP have "excitedly FaceTimed friends with him." A source close to the duo revealed which features the newborn got from each of his parents. "He’s a cross between the two of them and is absolutely tiny," the source said. "In some lights, he looks like A$AP and in others, Rihanna. He has got Rihanna’s eyes!"

May 19, 2022: Rihanna Spotted for the First Time Since Welcoming Her Baby Boy

Rihanna is officially in her hot mom era. The singer and beauty mogul was spotted out in public for the first time since giving birth to her son on May 13. TMZ obtained pics of Rihanna rocking an oversized gray sweatshirt and baggy pants as she left her West Hollywood home and entered an SUV.

May 13, 2022: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Welcome Their Baby Boy

Congrats are in order for the new parents! TMZ reported on May 19 that Rih and A$AP welcomed a baby boy on May 13 in Los Angeles, but no name has been revealed.

According to an ET source, “Before Rihanna gave birth, A$AP was super involved and was asking his friends for parenting advice. He wants to be the best dad possible and continue to take care of Rihanna. He's really looking forward to raising their baby boy together.”

The couple reportedly has not left each other’s side since the birth of their first child, with the source explaining that "they are over the moon. [Rihanna’s] been looking forward to motherhood for a long time. This little boy is going to have the best baby fashion.”

The source tells ET that Rihanna and A$AP are hoping to travel to New York so that their newborn son can meet both artists’ families.

May 05, 2022: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Get Married in "D.M.B" Video

Ever wonder what Rihanna would look like as a bride? Well, the Anti songstress put those questions to rest when she starred in her boyfriend, A$AP Rocky's new "D.M.B," music video. Shot in New York City last summer, "Das Ma Bish" follows the couple as they navigate through ride-or-die scenarios. Despite hiccups, like Rocky going to jail, the couple's love ultimately conquers all with them tying the knot while rocking "Will You Marry Me" and "I Do" grillz.

Rocky, who directed the video, took to Instagram, thanking his "lady" Rihanna for her assistance in the video. "$PECIAL THANK$ 2 MY LADY FOR THE MOTIVATION & ROLE," he wrote.

April 23, 2022: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Step Out in LA After Rocky's Arrest

Rihanna and Rocky stepped out for dinner with friends on Saturday in Santa Monica, California. According to People, a source disclosed that "it was a happy and relaxed group."

"Rihanna looked great. She sat next to A$AP and they were affectionate," they continued. "They dined for a couple of hours. The focus was very much on Rihanna and the baby."

Rihanna, once again, rocked a stunning look. She wore a black bra underneath an open white button down shirt and black jacket that bared her bump. She paired the sequined bra with matching shorts, and open-toe stiletto pumps. Meanwhile, Rocky wore a gray T-shirt underneath a floral-detailed hoodie and jeans.

This was the first time the couple was spotted in public together following A$AP Rocky's arrest at Los Angeles International Airport on Wednesday, April 20. After having just landed on a private plane from Barbados, the rapper was detained in connection to a November 2021 shooting. He was soon released on a $550,000 bail.

March 20, 2022: Rihanna and Rocky Spark Engagement Rumors

Could Rihanna and A$AP Rocky be headed down the aisle? The singer is fueling engagement rumors after she was spotted with a huge diamond ring on her left ring finger.

The new pics came after the expectant mama was photographed shopping for baby clothes in Los Angeles on Sunday. It was the same day that she shared an adorable baby bump post on her Instagram Story.

Rihanna is known for rocking lavish jewels, so there's no telling if this is simply a ring with diamonds or a dazzling diamond engagement ring. Either way, the Fenty Beauty mogul will confirm the news (if there's any to confirm) when she's ready, just like she did with her pregnancy.

March 1, 2022: The Couple Attends Fashion Month Shows

Throughout Fashion Month, Rihanna and A$AP Rocky have stepped out in a number of incredibly stunning, newsworthy looks and on March 1, the singer wore one of her most daring numbers yet. Headed to Dior's Autumn/Winter 2022 show in the Jardin des Tuileries in Paris, Rihanna wore a black sheer dress that fully showcased her baby bump, and black knee-high leather boots. Iconic.

One day earlier, on February 28, the couple attended the Off-White Fall 2022 show together, where Rih rocked a peach leather minidress, matching shearling coat, and strappy heels. A$AP also wore a monochromatic leather look.

But that's not all. The duo stunned at the Gucci show in Milan, where Rihanna wore a black latex crop top and black pants, paired with a purple fuzzy coat and gold headpiece. A$AP again wore black leather pants, complemented with a black zip-up jacket, adidas x Gucci gloves, and a monogrammed suitcase.

February 11, 2022: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Attend the Fenty Beauty Universe Event

Rihanna and A$AP Rocky attended the Fenty Beauty Universe Event in Los Angeles to celebrate the pop star's successful brands, Fenty Beauty and Fenty Skin. It marked the first time the couple publicly stepped out since their pregnancy announcement. On the red carpet, Rih wore a bright green ombre sequin top with glowing skin and a red lip while Rocky wore a purple letterman jacket.

The stars were doing separate interviews when Rocky suddenly joined Rih during a conversation with E! News. The reporter then asked Rocky what his favorite product from the Fenty line was, and without hesitation, the rapper looked at Rihanna and said "Her." The "Diamonds" singer then went on to say that he's a keeper, and indeed he is.

January 31, 2022: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Are Expecting!

Per Page Six, Rihanna and A$AP Rocky are officially expecting their first child together. The couple was spotted on a stroll in Rocky's hometown of Harlem, where Rih showed off her baby bump in a long pink coat and loose ripped jeans. She also rocked a long necklace, which rested on her stomach that peeked out of her coat.

January 2022: The Couple Is Spotted in NYC

Rih and Rocky have been spotted holding hands and taking strolls on multiple occasions in New York City. Of course, the power couple's outfits were on point every. Single. Time.

November 7, 2021: Rihanna Supports A$AP Rocky at ComplexCon

A report by E! News revealed that Rihanna was supporting A$AP Rocky at his latest live performance as she sang along and snapped videos from the front row on Sunday, November 7. According to the outlet, A$AP Rocky was the Sunday-night headlining performer of ComplexCon, a two-day festival in Long Beach, California. He was performing his 2011 mixtape, LIVE. LOVE. A$AP for the first time ever at the convention, and Rih looked happier than ever while showing her partner support.

September 13, 2021: They Attend the MET Gala

Rihanna and A$AP Rocky pulled up to the 2021 MET Gala at the eleventh hour, causing social media hysteria over whether or not the couple would attend. Luckily for us, they didn't disappoint. Rihanna rocked an all-black Balenciaga cape dress with a matching black beanie and a diamond hairpiece. Rocky sported a giant quilt over a black suit and white shirt.

September 7, 2021: The Couple Snaps a Pic With Nicki Minaj and Her Family

The lovebirds posed for a family-friendly photo opp with Nicki Minaj, her husband, Kenneth Petty, and their young son, who Nicki affectionately calls Papa Bear.

July 11, 2021: The Two Are Seen on Set of a Music Video in NYC

Rihanna and A$AP Rocky were caught in New York City on the set of a music video. The Anti singer wore a pink sherbet-colored fur coat and denim shorts as she sat on a fire escape next to the A$AP Mob emcee who wore a matching fur hat.

May 19, 2021: A$AP Rocky Opens Up About His Love for Rihanna

As GQ's June cover star, 32-year-old A$AP Rocky confessed his love for Rihanna in the exclusive interview. When asked about the Fenty Beauty mogul, Rocky started "beaming like a teenager whose crush just accepted his prom invite."

"She amounts to probably, like, a million of the other ones," Rocky said, "I think when you know, you know. She’s the One." He also referred to Rih as his "lady," and the love of his life.

He rented a tour bus with Rih last summer and embarked on a country-wide trip with stops in Texas, Tennessee, and some national parks, which he admitted strengthened their bond. "I met myself," he said of the trip. "Being able to drive and do a tour without feeling like it was an occupation or an obligated job agreement, I feel like that experience is like none other," Rocky recalled. "I never experienced nothing like it."

April 12, 2021: The Couple Is Spotted on Date Night in LA

The pair looked fashionable while out and about in LA. They went out for dinner at tk, Rocky wore a black-on-black outfit while Rihanna opted for a brown vintage leather fur coat from Archive.

According to a source, Rocky and Rih have been hanging out since last summer and even made it official within their inner circles. "Things changed over the summer and they finally hooked up. They've been together ever since," the source told Us Weekly.

January 2021: Rihanna Steps Out in Rocky's Latest Footwear Collab

Rih publicly supported Rocky's collaboration with footwear designer Amina Muaddi as she rocked a pair of the .

"new year’s resolution: apply the pressure," the 33-year-old singer captioned the photo.

December 24, 2020: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Vacation in Barbados

Rihanna and A$AP Rocky have had a longstanding friendship and even worked together on some music before becoming more. The couple went on a cruise to Rih's homeland of Barbados, where Rocky allegedly met her family and spent time with them on Christmas.

"They've known each other for so long as friends and in a work setting, which makes it so easy for them to get along, travel together and be involved in each other’s lives to the full extent," a source told Entertainment Tonight. "They always have such a good time together and definitely seem in love."

December 2020: The Two Are Spotted Walking in NYC

The two were seen together quite often, be it for an evening stroll or dinner at the Beatrice Inn in New York City. According to reports by Page Six and People, Rih and Rocky had finally taken their relationship to the next level at this point.

August 26, 2020: Rocky Models with Rihanna for Fenty Skin

Rocky modeled alongside Rihanna in a campaign for her skincare line, Fenty Skin. Dare I say that they both look glowy and ethereal? Talk about serious couple goals.

They also promoted the skincare launch by doing an exclusive video interview with GQ, where Rocky got candid about his own skincare journey.

"I had to discover face cleansing and skincare all at the same time when I was a young buck in the shower," he said in the video. "You can't wash your body with the same rag you wash your face with. I was lucky enough to be the type of guy that wants to wash my face."

January 2020: Rihanna Reportedly Splits from Hassan Jameel

Rihanna reportedly called things off with her billionaire beau of three years, Hassan Jameel. A source told People that the breakup happened because they weren't a "good match" and that it was "hard to maintain a relationship."

After that, romance rumors surrounding Rih and Rocky began to hit the internet. A source told The Sun that Rih shared a hotel room with Rocky and that she was "reluctant to put a label on it as it's so soon after Hassan."

The source also said that Rih and Rocky's relationship was "casual" and that she was a "newly-single girl having fun."

A different source told E! News that the singer was merely hanging out with Rocky but not dating him.

December 2, 2019: Rihanna and Rocky Pose Together at the 2019 British Fashion Awards

The pair attended the British Fashion Awards in London and even posed for photos on the red carpet together. They both wore ensembles by her newly-minted fashion brand, Fenty.

September 12, 2019: Rocky Attends Rihanna's 5th Annual Diamond Ball

Rocky attended Rihanna's 5th Annual Diamond Ball benefitting the Clara Lionel Foundation for the second year in a row.

Rihanna and A$AP Rocky chat inside the 5th Annual Diamond Ball Benefitting The Clara Lionel Foundation on Sept. 12, 2019.

September 13, 2018: Rocky Is a Guest at Rihanna's Diamond Ball

Rihanna invited Rocky to her 4th Annual Diamond Ball, a coveted fashion charity event in support of the Clara Lionel Foundation she founded to support global educational programs. It was his first time attending and he wore a sleek black suit with diamond stud earrings.

June 21, 2018: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Sit Front Row Together at the Louis Vuitton Show

Rih and Rocky are seen getting cozy while sitting front row at Louis Vuitton's Spring/Summer 2019 fashion show at Paris Fashion Week.

May/June 2017: Rihanna Begins Dating Hassan Jameel

This is around the time when Rihanna started dating billionare Hassan Jameel. Dating rumors about Rocky and supermodel Kendall Jenner started circulating as they were seen getting cozy at the Met Gala that same year.

2013: A$AP Rocky Joins Rihanna's Tour

A$AP Rocky joined Rihanna as the opening act on the North American leg of her Diamonds World Tour.

2012: Rihanna and A$AP Rocky Collaborate

This is one of the first times we see the pair linked together. Rocky hopped on a remix of Rihanna's single, "Cockiness (Love It)," which describes Rih's sexual dominance over her partner.

They also performed the track at MTV's Video Music Awards on Sept. 6, 2012.
